channel.title: R on We Love Apes

item.title: Merge two table
item.description: The question is how to merge two tables, it is easy to use merge. However, it is not easy to merge because the two table have different sample sizes and we want to keep all of them. Table 1: Some names not in table 2 name plot1 name_z 1 name_f 2 name_a 3 name_d 4 name_n 5 name_p 6 name_o 7 name_s 8 name_l 9 name_w 10 name_t 11 name_k 12 name_m 13 name_g 14 name_q 15 Table 1: Some names not in table 1 name plot2 name_h 1 name_f 2 name_r 3 name_b 4 name_e 5 name_w 6 name_n 7 name_x 8 name_z 9 name_a 10 Now we have problems, some names exist in table 1 but not in table 2, and vice verse.
